title: Ann's Decision
description: Ann Romano is now on her own with her two daughters Julie and Barbara and must decide whether to let Julie go on a mixed camp out.

title: Chicago Rendezvous
description: Everyone but Ann is aware how deep she is involved with her boyfriend, her first relationship since her divorce.

title: Jealousy
description: Ann is jealous of her girls spending time with her ex-husband's girlfriend. Julie is jealous of her boyfriend's looks toward a cheerleader.

title: How to Succeed Without Trying
description: When her boyfriend gets her a job at a public relations firm, Ann is worried that they are more interested in her sex appeal.

title: David Loves Ann
description: David proposes to Ann first giving her a week and then asking for an answer immediately.

title: Julie's Best Friend
description: Julie has a new friend with expensive tastes and Julie starts demanding the same things from her mother.

title: Super Blues
description: Ann plans a party inviting other building residents and Schneider gets upset when he finds out that he's not invited.

title: All the Way
description: When Ann finds out that Julie is being pressured by Chuck to have sex, Ann tells her to carefully think about it and make her own decision.

title: Fighting City Hall
description: An excessive phone bill has Ann writing everyone from city hall to the President and the Secret Service shows up at her door.

title: David Plus Two
description: Ann questions her platonic relationship with David when she finds him in a compromising position with a fellow tenant.

title: Julie's Job
description: Julie gets a job as a waitress in a bad section of town so she can earn money for a car after Ann turned her down and told her to go out and earn the money herself.

title: The College Man
description: Julie's date with a college student turns sour when he seems interested in her Mother and Ann doesn't mind the attention.

title: Father David
description: Barbara and Julie try to sneak beer into a party that David is chaperoning.

title: Dad Comes Back: Part 1
description: Ann is all excited about her new job until she learns that her ex-husband is getting married.

title: Dad Comes Back: Part 2
description: Julie and Barbara are hoping to get their parents back together, but they learn to accept that that is not going to happen.

title: The Runaways: Part 1
description: Julie and Chuck run away after Julie has an argument with Ann about her future.

title: The Runaways: Part 2
description: Julie and Chuck are on the run while Ann is racked with guilt.

title: The Runaways: Part 3
description: Scheinder is hooking up with truckers trying to find the runaways using his CB radio.

title: The Runaways: Part 4
description: After all their things are stolen, Julie and Chuck consider calling her sister Barbara.

title: Barbara's Emergence
description: Barbara decides to change her image.

title: David's New Job: Part 1
description: David returns from Los Angeles with a job offer and the intention of marrying Ann.

title: David's New Job: Part 2
description: David returns from Los Angeles and asks Ann to marry him and join him there. Then he starts to work on the girls to help him.

title: The Upholstery Ripoff
description: Ann must deal with an unscrupulous furniture reupholsterer.

title: Schneider's Pride and Joy
description: Schneider is very proud of his nephew not knowing that he is really a thief.

title: A Visit from Dad
description: Ann's father wants his daughter to come home with the girls.

title: The Maestro
description: When Ann's boss assigns her to handle the PR for a visiting symphony conductor, she soon finds herself succumbing to the maestro's charms.

title: Happy New Year
description: Schneider and the Romanos put on a show for a local retirement home.

title: J.C. and Julie: Part 1
description: Julie has found Jesus and is driving everyone crazy.

title: J.C. and Julie: Part 2
description: The reborn Julie brings home a tramp to save.

title: The New Car
description: Ann refuses to let her ex-husband spoil their daughters with giving them a car.

title: Schneider Loves Ginny
description: Schneider hopes that Ginny will accept his marriage proposal.

title: Ginny's Child
description: Ginny seems to be depressed every Sunday afternoon.

title: Julie's Operation
description: Ann questions the use of a young physician when Jule develops appendicitis and their usual doctor is out of town.

title: The Traveling Salesperson
description: Her boss suddenly questions whether he should give a woman the job that he just assigned to Ann.

title: The Butterfields
description: Julie sends a "Dear John" letter to Chuck in the middle of a feud between Ann and his parents.

title: Barbara Plus Two
description: Barbara accepts one date to a school dance and then can't turn down another one.

title: The Singles Bar
description: Ann and her friend Ginny try the singles bar scene.

title: The College Question
description: After entrance exams get Julie down she decides to not go to college.

title: The Girls Alone
description: Julie and Barbara want to sneak out to a party when their Mom is in Las Vegas. They forget about the party when they call her and find out that she never reached her hotel.

title: The Older Man: Part 1
description: Julie gets a job from a guy who's car she plowed into. They become involved and this 42-year-old man proposes to Julie not unlike the tale of her mother's first marriage.

title: The Older Man: Part 2
description: Julie gets a job from a guy who's car she plowed into. They become involved and this 42-year-old man proposes to Julie not unlike the tale of her mother's first marriage.

title: The Older Man: Part 3
description: Julie gets a job from a guy who's car she plowed into. They become involved and this 42-year-old man proposes to Julie not unlike the tale of her mother's first marriage.

title: The Older Man: Part 4
description: Julie gets a job from a guy who's car she plowed into. They become involved and this 42-year-old man proposes to Julie not unlike the tale of her mother's first marriage.

title: Ann's Out-of-Town Client
description: A client from out of town has more than business on his mind.

title: Bob Loves Barbara
description: An insecure boy interested in dating Barbara takes out a notorious classmate to boost his confidence.

title: The Second Mrs. Cooper
description: The girls feel their dad's new wife is pushing them out of his life.

title: The Ghost Writer
description: Barbara hands in Julie's poetry for an assignment and she is hailed as a genius.

title: Barbara's Friend: Part 1
description: Barbara tries making friends with a girl that is too pushy and clingy.

title: Barbara's Friend: Part 2
description: Barbara's friend calls and says that she has taken a lot of pills.

title: Schneider's Kid
description: The Romano's run into a young man who is Schneider's son from a previous marriage.

title: Ann's Crisis
description: Ann feels that her 36th birthday is a major crisis in her life.

title: The Race Driver: Part 1
description: Ann at first doesn't want to be introduced to a dashing race car driver by her daughters and then has a change of heart.

title: The Race Driver: Part 2
description: Ann begins to question her relationship with the race car driver.

title: Ann's Secretary
description: Ann's latest secretary is supposedly a former drug user.

title: Barbara's Rebellion
description: Barabara is tired of being known as Ms. Goody Two Shoes and runs off to Chicago with shy Bob and check into a hotel room together.

title: The New Owner
description: Determined not to lose his job, Schneider woes the new owner who falls for him.

title: Ann's Competitor
description: Ann has a new highly motivated competitor in her office, Miss Francine Webber.

title: The Dress Designer
description: Julie wants to get her dress designs into a fashion show after the required deadline.

title: Take the Money
description: When Julie and Barbara are searching for $200 to buy Schneider's stereo, Julie finds too much money in her checking account and uses it.

title: Barbara the Fink
description: Barabra witnesses an act of vandalism and is torn between telling the truth and ratting on a friend.

title: Julie's Big Move: Part 1
description: Julie moves out, but Ann wonders if she and her irresponsible roommate can make it on their own.

title: Julie's Big Move: Part 2
description: Julie moves out, but Ann wonders if she and her irresponsible roommate can make it on their own.

title: Ann, the Father
description: Ann's advice to a friend of Barbara's leads to trouble between him and his father.

title: Father, Dear Father: Part 1
description: Ann's ex-husband tells her that he can no longer afford to pay child support. His current wife is too high maintenance.

title: Father, Dear Father: Part 2
description: Ann and family learn why Ed is so broke.

title: Ann's Friend
description: Ann has to deal with the breakup of a friend's marriage.

title: Bob's New Girl
description: Bob finds another girl after failing to win Barbara away from Cliff and she isn't happy with his new girlfriend.

title: Schneider's Helper
description: When Schneider hurts his back, Barbara gets him to hire a disabled friend who is put to the test during a gas leak.

title: Yes Sir, That's My Baby
description: A old friend of Barbara's shows up with a baby and Barbara's boyfriend Cliff is the father.

title: The Dating Game
description: When Ann calls a business associate that she is interested in, he thinks the dinner is just business.

title: Peabody's War
description: An elderly resident who refuses to pay higher rent locks himself in the Romano's apartment with a gun and will not release them until he can be on television and explain his case.

title: Jealousy: Part 1
description: Julie and Barbara are competing for the affections of the same band musician.

title: Jealousy: Part 2
description: The battle for the band leader Doug continues as Barbara tries to win him back from Julie.

title: The Arab Connection
description: Ann is conducting business with an Arab sheik just as Julie is protesting against his country.

title: Hold the Mustard
description: Barbara's new restaurant job is moving faster than expected.

title: Girl Talk
description: Ann, Julie and Barbara are trapped in a cabin on Christmas Eve and have a heart to heart.

title: The Married Man: Part 1
description: Ann has a relationship with a married sportswriter.

title: The Married Man: Part 2
description: Ann has a relationship with a married sportswriter.

title: The Married Man: Part 3
description: Ann has a relationship with a married sportswriter.

title: Going Nowhere
description: Depression hits poor Julie as her career in fashion is going nowhere.

title: Francine Strikes Again
description: One of Ann's business accounts is stolen by Francine.

title: The Dental Hygienist
description: Immediately after Schneider meets an old friend of Ann Romano's, they are off on a cruise together.

title: The Piano Teacher
description: A baby grand piano is mistakenly delivered to Ann's apartment and the real owner ends up giving lessons in her living room.

title: The Broken Nose
description: When Schneider accidentally breaks Barbara's nose, she learns a lesson about life, beauty and herself.

title: Mad for Each Other
description: Julie gets together with a film maker who's personality matches hers.

title: The Graduation
description: A conflict arises as to how Barbara should celebrate her graduation.

title: Fear of Success
description: A lucrative offer to direct public relations for a computer firm prompts Ann to give Mr. Davenport two weeks' notice.

title: Grandma Leaves Grandpa
description: Grandma Romano shows up at their door saying that she has left Ann's father and that she would like to live with them.

title: Schneider Gets Fired
description: Schneider loses his job over a pay dispute.

title: Back to School
description: As Barbara starts college and enjoys her independence, Ann feels her education is lacking and takes a college class that Barbara is also taking.

title: Pressure
description: Barbara's current boyfriend pressures her to have sex, so Barbara feels she should at least go out and buy some protection.

title: Julie's Wedding: Part 1
description: Julie comes home with a guy she plans to marry acting all sweet and submissive.

title: Julie's Wedding: Part 2
description: Julie prepares for her wedding as the best man tells her how much he loves her. Who will she go down the aisle with?

title: Home Again, Home Again
description: An airline strike leaves the Horvaths homeless.

title: Between Mother and Daughter
description: Resentments surface between Ann and her mother.

title: Small Wonder
description: Barbara's young tutor falls for her.

title: Et tu, Ann?
description: Ann hires a handsome male assistant.

title: A Little Larceny
description: Barbara sets out to raise money for a vacation.

title: Heart Attack
description: Ann suffers a heart attack and needs to slow down her business and personal life.

title: Male Jealousy
description: A feud erupts between Schneider and Max for male dominance in the Romano household as well as the attention of Ann and the girls.

title: Happy New Year II
description: Another year and another show at the retirement home.

title: Schneider, the Model
description: At first Schneider is happy with being asked to be a model and then he learns...

title: Triple Play
description: A salesman shows up and seems to be romancing Barbara, Ann and Grandma.

title: So Long, Mom
description: Ann finds herself alone in an empty nest.

title: Old Horizons
description: Grandma moves into town, takes an apartment nearby and gets a job in Ann's office.

title: Endless Elliot
description: Elliot is so interested in Barbara that he is driving her crazy bordering on harassment.

title: Retrospective: Part 1
description: Imminent condo-conversion causes reminiscing.

title: Retrospective: Part 2
description: Schneider, Ann and the girls continue to reminisce about the past as the construction of condominiums seems to be a sure thing.

title: Girl with a Past
description: Bob shows up and has to explain to Barbara all about his girlfriend's past.

title: Perils of Plastic
description: Newlyweds Julie and Max have accumulated too much credit card debt.

title: No Laughing Matter
description: Ann brings home a local comedian after Schneider had just had a bad experience.

title: Connor's Crisis
description: After left by his wife, Mr. Connors, Ann's boss, is taken out to dinner by Ann and ends up with a gold-digger.

title: Grecian Yearn
description: Ann falls for her Greek-archaeology professor.

title: Pen Pals
description: Schneider's cell mate from a gambling raid shows up at his apartment.

title: The Spirit Is Willing
description: The death of Schneider's lover leaves him so crushed that he can't seem to perform anymore.

title: Teacher's Pet
description: Barbara's hard work at college doesn't seem to be paying off until her professor makes some inappropriate advances.

title: The Amarillo Connection
description: After winning an important account and a victory over Francine, Ann finds that she will have to move to Texas.

title: Ann Meets Nick: Part 1
description: Ann meets an artist that she finds very obnoxious and intimidating.

title: Farewell, My Suite
description: Ann and Barbara have been robbed and apparently with Schneider's help.

title: The Drop Out
description: Searching for a college major has brought Barbara to a dead end and she decides to take time out from school.

title: November Song: Part 1
description: Schneider falls for a younger woman who also wants her freedom.

title: November Song: Part 2
description: Schneider is jealous over his new younger girlfriend.

title: Five Fingered Discount
description: Who would think that Grandma Romano would be arrested for shoplifting?

title: I Do, I Do
description: Barbara takes up political activism in the form of a man who is about to be deported to a country who wants to execute him.

title: Once a Mom
description: Ann's come down with influenza and now her meddling mother wants to play nurse-maid as if Ann's still her baby girl.

title: Caveat Emptor
description: Ann's and Nick's new account were in fruition until they found out the merchant is involved in a bait-and-switch scheme.

title: Small Wonder II
description: The child prodigy who once tutored Barbara is now her boss.

title: Wicked Ann
description: Alex feels that Ann is keeping his mother and father from getting back together.

title: Indianapolis Story
description: Nick and Ann are finally along together until Ann's old boyfriend David shows up unannounced.

title: Airport
description: While waiting for Ann at the airport, Schneider, Babara and Alex all have run-ins with the opposite sex.

title: Shake Hands
description: Ann's business is in trouble and Francine Webber offers to be her partner. Ann is skeptical until she works her magic with a client.

title: Julie Shows Up: Part 2
description: Julie shows up on Ann's doorstep announcing that not only is she leaving Max, but that she's pregnant.

title: Alex's First Love
description: Alex has a date and Ann's overprotective instincts return.

title: Gift Horses
description: While Ann is off on a business trip Barbara is left between two competing grandmothers.

title: Grandma's Nest Egg
description: Grandma Romano is having a hot relationship with Francine's father.

title: Mrs. O'Leary's Kid
description: Alex knows he doesn't deserve the accolades for saving some people from a fire because he caused it.

title: The Defector
description: During a visit to Ann's apartment by the Russian women's basketball team, one member falls for Schneider and decides to defect.

title: Hardball
description: Alex gets Max to coach his baseball team. Trouble arises when Max won't let Alex play.

title: Orville and Emily
description: Another opening, another show for the retirement home.

title: The Perfect Wedding: Part 1
description: Barbara is all nerves as her wedding approaches especially when Mark decides to play golf just before the ceremony.

title: The Perfect Wedding: Part 2
description: Barbara is about to be married and the groom hasn't returned from the golf course.

title: The Honeymoon is Over
description: Barbara has trouble adjusting to married life when Mark's old place has community facilities and beautiful single women walking about.

title: Last Time I Saw Paris
description: Francine talks Ann into a weekend business trip to Paris to learn about the people and the business climate when they start having dealings with French clients.

title: Lovers & Other Parents
description: Ann and Mark's father have dinner with Mark and Barbara and things move very fast between them.

title: Miracle of Birth: Part 2
description: Julie is determined to go to California to have an underwater birth, but the baby has other ideas and is born in Ann's apartment.

title: First Things First
description: When Barbara returns to college, there is little money and little time for romance.

title: Pride and Privacy: Part 2
description: Both married couples and little Annie are now at Ann's house driving her crazy.

title: The Cruise
description: A shipboard romance for Grandma Romano has her planning to marry the lounge piano player.

title: Spare the Child
description: Alex's video game mania may be a symptom of a deeper problem.

title: The Hero
description: Saving a man's life gets Schneider a cushy executive job with very little to do.

title: The Good Life
description: Sam offers Ann paradise on a Pacific island if she'll leave everything in Indianapolis.

title: Take My Ex
description: Sam is pampering his ex-wife a bit too much for Ann's tastes.

title: Worried Heart
description: With Sam off on a business trip with an ex-girl friend, Ann's imagination gets the better of her.

title: Travel Agent
description: While on a trip Barbara finds herself a new job.

title: Fifty
description: On Schneider's fiftieth birthday he is visited by a face from the past.

title: Bring in the Clowns
description: Mark's friend's jokes are going too far so Barbara decides to teach them a lesson.

title: The Nearness of You
description: Working with her brother-in-law sparks something between him and Barbara.

title: Off We Go
description: Ann receives an offer to be in charge of a marketing enterprise in England. She's concerned for family & friends and also worries about taking this big step that would change her life.

title: Another Man's Shoes
description: When his brother dies, Schneider decides to move there to take care of his niece and nephew. It's hard, but then Ann, Barbara and Julie are all gone and thus the series ends. Schneider will be taking life himself "One Day at a Time."
